channel.title: Broken nose -___-
channel.description:
Me and friend we're fucking round. I pinned him on the floor (no homo) then i let off e swug his elbow up to get up smacked me right in the fucking nose. I started pouring out blood, ima say about a pint. Its been about an hour now and i cant feel my nose, i know its in pain and i don't want to agrivate it. I've tried moving it around and it seems fine. I bled for about 20 minutes if that means anything. I can't breath out of my right nostril but blood was coming out of both nostrils. My right is already pretty swollen. Think it's broken? Should i go to the doctors? I mean i tough shit out and i was just like aye get me my laptop im bored of this bleeding. It feels like i took an arrow to the nose though -____-. Suggestions?
Debating just waking my parents to take me to er (Keeping in mind it is 2:00 am) and they'll get pretty pist is my idea. Cheers if you can help out.

item.title: Broken nose -___-
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Paper towels and duct tape.

Read full topic

This is gods way of punishing gay faggots.

item.title: Broken nose -___-
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Theres not much they can do for a broken nose… Not like they can give you a cast or anything. Aslong as its not bleeding still and aslong as it doesn’t look like someone stood on your face I would leave it.

Read full topic
